steps.intro: Hello Stranger, nice to have you here. Have a look around.
Use arrows, to pan accross your design
Use (+) and (-) to zoom in and out
This is the plant library. This is where you will find over 800 plants to use in your design.
This is the buildings and small architecture library. Garden furniture, cars, people and animals. It's all here.
Ground texture library. Cover parts of you garden with grass, put concrete on your driveway. Add a path between the shrubs.
Select one of the tabs to explore plants within the section. Click and drag the plant to your garden design.
Once you create a design, you can preview it in 3D here.
